expression: #"Changed Types" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Promoted Headers",{{"outside_case", Int64.Type}, {"createdtime", type datetime}, {"outsidecasesid", Int64.Type}, {"outside_case_id", type text}, {"number", type text}, {"claim_number", type text}, {"lock_automation", Int64.Type}, {"total_bill_amount", type number}, {"pmc_collections_limit", type number}, {"total_collections", type number}, {"total_balance", type number}, {"litigation_status", type text}, {"litigation_status_other", type text}, {"note", type text}, {"insured", Int64.Type}, {"policy_number", type text}, {"insurance_company", Int64.Type}, {"type_of_claim", type text}, {"provider", Int64.Type}, {"outside_case_number", type text}, {"date_of_loss", type date}, {"first_notice_of_loss", type date}, {"service_types", type text}, {"types_of_services", type text}}, "en-US"),
